extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable

      • m_orderOfExperimentation

        private java.util.ArrayList<Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer[]>> m_orderOfExperimentation
        the order in which the the blocks will be played. And, for each blocks, the order in which the trials will be played This is a Mx1xNi array where the first dimension is the number of Block. The second dimensions is the index of the blocks in the m_blocks attribute of the Experimentation class. The third dimensions is the order of the trials for the block. In contains indexes referring to the m_trials attribute of the Block class
        See Also:
        Block, Experimentation

      • m_currentBlock

        private int m_currentBlock
        The block which is currently being played by the sitting manager. Referring the index of in the m_orderOfExperimentation attribute.

      • m_currentTrial

        private int m_currentTrial
        the trial currently being played by the sitting manager. Referring the index of in the m_orderOfExperimentation attribute.

      • generateExperimentSeed

        private static final int generateExperimentSeed()
        Generate a seed for the experiment based on the words the trials in it contain. The seed will always be the same for the same experiment, and the random generation from it will stay the same.
        Returns:
